CustomField.description: This field should be populated as follows: 'AUTO-APPROVE' - The field should be set to 'AUTO-APPROVE' if the Application.Credit_Rating value meets the minimum credit approval status. 'AUTO-DECLINE' - The field should be set to 'AUTO-DECLINE' if the Application.Credit_Rating value does not meet the minimum credit approval status. 'MANUAL REVIEW' - The field should be set to 'MANUAL REVIEW' if the Application.Credit_Rating value falls below automatic approval requirements but above automatic rejection requirements.
CustomField.label: Credit Approval Status
